item.title: Dirty Stream: Exploiting Android's File Sharing - Part 1
item.description: An in-depth exploration of exploiting a path traversal vulnerability in Android using the ‘Dirty Stream’ technique. This post covers initial exploration, refining a defanged PoC, and achieving a successful file write.

item.title: About
item.description:
Hallo!

I’m Angelo Alviar, a security researcher with five years of experience in red teaming, penetration testing, and application security. I focus on mobile application security and continually work to identify and address potential vulnerabilities. While much of this blog is written for personal reference, I hope its insights prove useful to the broader community.
